Common Strays and Wilds (Friend or Foe?)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Battle (Tournaments/Strays): Common Strays and Wilds (Friend or Foe?)
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, December 4, 2002 - 09:09 am:

This list is for common monsters that you may encounter as Strays (on your ranch) or Wilds (on expedition).
-The Move column is what you get when you succeed in making friends, you will only get the listed move on Expedition.
-The list for Class S also applies to Master Rank.
